java.lang.Object
  br.uff.midiacom.ana.util.xml.XMLElementPrototype<T>

Type Parameters:

All Implemented Interfaces:
NCLElement<T>, ReferredElement<T>, XMLElement<T>
public class NCLVariable<T extends NCLElement>
extends NCLNamedElementPrototype<T,java.lang.Object>
implements ReferredElement<T>

Class that represents an NCL document global variable. This variable is referred by document rules and is declared by property elements children of a media element of type settings.

NCLVariable

public NCLVariable(java.lang.Object name)
            throws XMLException
Global variable constructor.

Parameters:
name - element representing the name of the variable. The name can be a string of a name from the list of reserved system variable names.
Throws:
XMLException - if the name is null.
Method Detail

setName

public void setName(java.lang.Object name)
             throws XMLException
Sets the name of the global variable as a reserved name. The name is required and can not be null.
